pyefun.timeBase 源代码

import time
import pendulum
import copy
from .stringBase import *

pendulum.set_locale('zh')


# 文档
# https://pendulum.eustace.io/docs/#instantiation

[文档]class 日期时间:
    t = pendulum.DateTime

    def __init__(self, str="now"):
        pass

        if (type(str) == int):
            self.t = pendulum.from_timestamp(str, tz='Asia/Shanghai')
        elif (str != ""):
            self.t = pendulum.parse(str)


[文档]    def 到文本(self, format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"):
        return self.t.format(format)



[文档]    def 取时间戳(self):
        return self.t.int_timestamp



[文档]    def 取日期(self):
        return self.t.to_date_string()



[文档]    def 取年(self):
        return self.t.year



[文档]    def 取月(self):
        return self.t.month



[文档]    def 取日(self):
        return self.t.day



[文档]    def 取小时(self):
        return self.t.hour



[文档]    def 取分钟(self):
        return self.t.minute



[文档]    def 取秒(self):
        return self.t.second



[文档]    def 取微妙(self):
        return self.t.microsecond



[文档]    def 取每周的第几天(self):
        return self.t.day_of_week



[文档]    def 取每年的第几天(self):
        return self.t.day_of_year



[文档]    def 取每月的第几周(self):
        return self.t.week_of_month



[文档]    def 取每年的第几周(self):
        return self.t.week_of_year



[文档]    def 取月天数(self):
        return self.t.days_in_month



[文档]    def 设置年月日(self, year=None, month=None, day=None):
        self.t = self.t.on(year=int(year), month=int(month), day=int(day))
        return self



[文档]    def 设置时分秒(self, hour=0, minute=0, second=0):
        self.t = self.t.at(hour, minute, second)
        return self



[文档]    def 增减日期时间(self, years=0, months=0, weeks=0, days=0, hours=0, minutes=0, seconds=0):
        self.t = self.t.add(years=years,
                            months=months,
                            weeks=weeks,
                            days=days,
                            hours=hours,
                            minutes=minutes,
                            seconds=seconds,
                            )
        return self



[文档]    def 取时间间隔(self, datetime):

        d = self.t.diff(datetime, abs=False)
        return {
            "years": d.in_years(),
            "months": d.in_months(),
            "days": d.in_days(),
            "hours": d.in_hours(),
            "minutes": d.in_minutes(),
            "seconds": d.in_seconds(),
            "weeks": d.in_weeks(),
        }



[文档]    def 取友好时间(self):
        d = self.t.diff_for_humans()
        return d



[文档]    def datetime(self):
        return self.t



[文档]    def copy(self):
        return copy.deepcopy(self)


    def __str__(self):
        return self.到文本()




[文档]def 取现行时间戳():
    return round(time.time())




[文档]def 日期到时间戳(str="now"):
    return 日期时间(str).取时间戳()




[文档]def 取现行时间():
    t = 日期时间()
    return t




[文档]def now():
    t = 日期时间()
    return t




[文档]def 创建日期时间(timestr):
    t = 日期时间(timestr)
    return t




[文档]def 时间迭代(start, end):
    """
    为支持单位range()有：years，months，weeks， days，hours，minutes和seconds
    for i in list.range('months'):
        print(i.to_datetime_string())
    """
    return pendulum.period(pendulum.parse(start), pendulum.parse(end))




[文档]def date(format, timestr="now"):
    t = 创建日期时间(timestr)
    format = 子文本替换(format, "Y", str(t.取年()))
    format = 子文本替换(format, "m", str(t.取月()))
    format = 子文本替换(format, "d", str(t.取日()))
    format = 子文本替换(format, "H", str(t.取小时()))
    format = 子文本替换(format, "i", str(t.取分钟()))
    format = 子文本替换(format, "s", str(t.取秒()))
    return format
